Wouter Spierenburg  Page 1 of 3 Curriculum Vitae – Wouter Spierenburg   Personal information:    Name Spierenburg First name City Wouter Rosmalen E-Mail wouter@spierenburg.net Phone +31628629294                 Relevant work experience:                                      1 April 2017 - Present Senior Sales Engineer at Vectra AI, Inc.  First man on the ground in the BeNeLux region. Also started Vectra’s activities in the Nordics and Eastern Europe.  Strong enterprise customer focus with extensive engagements with both technical and non-technical stakeholders to drive deal progression. Enabled channel partners and supported direct and indirect sales processes. Strong interaction with internal teams such as Product Management, Marketing and leadership to drive improvements and expansion.    Wouter Spierenburg  Page 1 of 3 Curriculum Vitae – Wouter Spierenburg   Personal information:    Name Spierenburg First name City Wouter Rosmalen E-Mail wouter@spierenburg.net Phone +31628629294                 Relevant work experience:                                      1 April 2017 - Present Senior Sales Engineer at Vectra AI, Inc.  First man on the ground in the BeNeLux region. Also started Vectra’s activities in the Nordics and Eastern Europe.  Strong enterprise customer focus with extensive engagements with both technical and non-technical stakeholders to drive deal progression. Enabled channel partners and supported direct and indirect sales processes. Strong interaction with internal teams such as Product Management, Marketing and leadership to drive improvements and expansion.   1 November 2015 – 31 March 2017  Pre-Sales Engineer BeNeLux and DACH at Flowmon Networks  As first Pre-Sales Engineer for Flowmon Networks in Western Europe, my main responsibility is to support the sales teams in various regions. Combining commercial insight and technical know-how, my main focus is on the BeNeLux market while supporting large(er) enterprise potentials in other regions. Activities in this role include product/vendor introductions, attending events, organizing regular update sessions with key-customers and partners, guiding PoC deployments and liaising with the CTO and product development. Flowmon is a 
Wouter Spierenburg  Page 2 of 3 IPFIX(NetFlow)-based product which allows for multiple use cases such as Network Performance Management(NPM), Anomaly Detection(ADS), Application Performance Monitoring(APM) and DDoS detection. The product can also be used for data retention purposes. Strong interaction with both C-Level management, networking and security departments. Providing insight from the network level is key for security behavior monitoring.  1 February 2010 – 31 October 2015 Technical Consultant at TechAccess Value Added IT Distribution  As technical consultant with TechAccess I am responsible for pre-sales, post-sales, consultancy projects and training delivery for our customers. My main focus is on networking and security products, ensuring compatibility and compliancy throughout the network and security infrastructure from L1-L7.  As a pre-sales engineer, gathering customer statements and determining a solution for their needs, presenting these based on slideware, demo’s and PoC’s.  Security focus is on Firewall(traditional and ngfw/utm), IPS, Authentication, AV, web-filtering, QoS, APT’s, anti-spam, redundancy, architectural design. Network focus is on routing and switching, vlans, link aggregation, dynamic routing protocols, QoS, DNS, DHCP, IPAM, DDoS Detection, redundancy and performance.   1 April 2006 – 31 January 2010 Technical Service Engineer at ACAL Nederland bv, acquired by Avnet Technology Solutions  Configuration, deployment and troubleshooting routers switches and firewalls from various vendors such as Cisco, Extreme, Juniper, Brocade/Foundry, CheckPoint.  1 September 2005 – 31 March 2006 Network engineer at Netguard Internet Solutions BV 
Wouter Spierenburg  Page 3 of 3  Configuring and maintaining routers and switches for customers, as well as our own infrastructure in the DC. Setup and maintained various servers on Windows, Linux and FreeBSD for business-critical systems       Education:   1996 - 2000 MAVO Diploma on D-level d’Oultremont college, Drunen  D-level is the highest level of difficulty available on the MAVO. 2000 – 2001 High school diploma Killeen High, Killeen, Texas, USA. 2001 – 2005 ICT-academie Koning Willem I College, ‘s-Hertogenbosch  Level 4, the highest level of difficulty available, focused on data communications

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
